articles.description: Euler Motors has raised Rs 200 crore ($24 million) more in Series C round led by new investor Piramal Alternatives India Access Fund.

articles.author: Abhinav Ranjan
articles.title: Vodafone Idea Share: 'Ye Bhaav Jarur Aayega' - Sanjiv Bhasin's big bet on Vi stock - ET Now
articles.description: Vodafine Idea Share Price: Ace investor Sanjiv Bhasin has advised ET NOW viewers not to sell Vodafone Idea shares. He said that Vi is on path to become EBITDA positive.
articles.content: Sanjiv Bhasin has exuded confidence that Vodafone Idea will do well and its shares will soon touch Rs 22-mark. (Pic: ET NOW)
